name: 曼尼·麦科德
introduction: Manny McCord, born in South Carolina, is an American actor who transitioned to Los Angeles following a successful collegiate football career to pursue a career in the TV and film industry. Mentored by John Kirby, he swiftly carved a niche in the entertainment world. Manny made his television debut on the Warner Brothers drama "All American Homecoming" and starred in his first feature film on Hulu, opposite Jim Belushi. His recent credits include a leading role in the Angel Studios Homestead series alongside Neil McDonough, and he is set to appear in an eagerly anticipated Marvel series.
